text:
Has anyone converted their husbpot site to SSL and had issues with replacing http:// with just a // to prevent any issues?

I was wondering if there was a better option than going through each page manually?  Can I use the api to do stuff like this? 

Is there some sort of magic find and replace that HubSpot can just do so we can make sure all internal links are fixed?
In most cases we do this for you in pages. That's not the case for included css and js since those are precompiled
so when we activate the ssl it goes through all the pages and does this?  Does that work for landing pages / blogs also?
it happens every time we render a page

Just over a week ago I downloaded the developer day zip file presentations from here.  Weirdly I seem to be getting repeat emails with it every two or three days.  Is anyone else experiencing this?  Does anyone know of a way to stop it?  Thanks in advance.
Which emails <@U2H62UV0U>? Mind sending me some details via PM and I can look into it
anyone know how to pass a variable to a gulp task?
<@U22PU4G4A> actually you know what?  Iâ€™m an idiot!  I only downloaded them from here.  Then emailed them to myself so it has nothing to do with slack lol.  Doh!  I need another cup of coffee!!
No worries! Glad we got it sorted out :slightly_smiling_face:
